title: Warring Kingdoms Katarina Recall Bug
body: Right after the assassin update I noticed Warring Kingdoms Katarina's callback animation had a bit of a glitch or bug to it in every game I've played it in. Whenever She throws the dagger in the air to catch it , the dagger spazzez out and wiggles back and fourth really quickly before falling. I would appreciate if the animation was fixed. Please and thank you. {{champion:55}}

replies.body:
Hi! 

Thanks for reporting this! This may be due to animation compression. Lemme catch up with the team and let them know! :)
